dublinCore.dc:title: 110 HJ 27 IH: Providing for the reappointment of Roger W.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Becerra (for himself, Ms. Matsui, and Mr. Sam Johnson of Texas) introduced the following joint resolution; which was referred to the Committee on House Administration

form.official-title: Providing for the reappointment of Roger W. Sant as a citizen regent of the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution.

section.text: That, in accordance with section 5581 of the Revised Statutes of the United States (20 U.S.C. 43), the vacancy on the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution, in the class other than Members of Congress, occurring by reason of the expiration of the term of Roger W. Sant of the District of Columbia, is filled by reappointment of the incumbent for a term of 6 years, effective October 25, 2007.
